name: wir-lernen-online
description: **Please open all issues with this template on the main [Foundation for Sites](https://github.com/zurb/foundation-sites/issues) repo.**

scripts.deploy-prod: read -r -n 1 -p 'Deploy to production server? [y/N]'; echo; [[ $REPLY =~ ^[Yy]$ ]] && rsync -ave ssh --delete --exclude=wlo-config.php --exclude=node_modules --exclude=.git ./ cloud@141.5.104.88:/var/www/prod.210317/wp-content/themes/wir-lernen-online/
